## http package

Client library for interacting with the Cerbos policy decision point over HTTP from browser-based applications.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [HTTP](./http.http.md) | A client for interacting with the Cerbos policy decision point server over HTTP. |
